article: Benjamin Franklin was a great scientist .He was the youngest of the  _  boys in his family . He was a clever boy,  _  cleverer than his nine brothers . He studied in school for only three years . He  liked  to learn new things .He  _  worked on new ideas even when he was a child . There are a lot of stories about him and here's one of them. One day in winter Benjamin Franklin learned from one of his  _  that something black in colour holds heat  _  than something white in colour " Is that true ?" he asked himself . He wanted to know the answer. It happened to be a  _  day and there was snow on the ground. He put two large pieces of cloth over the snow . One piece was black in colour and the other was white . The sun shone  _  the two pieces of cloth .Two hours later ,Franklin took off the cloth and found that the snow under the black cloth melted more  _  than the snow under the white cloth. He was happy that he had learned  something  from his friend.
